title: Augusta County: Mary A. Smiley to Thomas M. Smiley, May 23, 1861
summary: Discusses political sentiment of the community and the coming election. Reports rumor of blacks killing whites.
keywords: Written note added later by family member or archivist states "Letter from Mary Allison Smiley to her brother, Thomas Martin Smiley stationed at Harpers Ferry. At this time, Mary was 16 and her brother 18"
